articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo Breaks Silence On Saudi Club Transfer Rumours - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo has broken the silence on the rumour linking him with a big-money move to Saudia Arabia club Al Nassr.
articles.content: Released by Manchester United after his contract was terminated, Cristiano Ronaldo is the only player in the Portugal squad at the FIFA World Cup 2022 who is without a club. In what has been a drama-… [+1934 chars]

articles.author: Vishal Dikshit
articles.title: Blunt in the middle - India have a bowling problem to solve - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: India were in winning positions in the first two ODIs in Bangladesh, but their second-string bowling attack could not land that knockout punch
articles.content: Shardul Thakur is India's top wicket-taker in the middle overs since 2020, but he was wicketless on Wednesday  •  AFP via Getty Images

articles.title: Vettel tells Hamilton: “Russell has talent and skill to become champion” - Crash
